thread.title_full: Saatva Mattress reviewed by Anna Mont

author: Anna Mont
title: Anna Mont
text: I was always the chaser of a great sleep , I have tried various matress companies during this pursuit. One of my friends bought a Saatva mattress and I had the opportunity of seeing it on arrival. It looked like a cloud , I don't know, it was inviting , pristine. I decided to buy one myself , a firm king size . I am pleased to tell you that my search has ended this matress is amazing , one of the main issues of other mattress I had was that when my husband moved or turned I, by force moved with him interrupting my sleep. This doesn't happen with the saatva , my side of the bed doesn't move anymore , I enjoy a pleasant uninterrupted sleep . Yes, I do recomend this mattress and I appreciate the cordial and informational treament that their customer service representative offered me .
